[[wikipedia:Windows 95|Windows 95]] | releasedate=Cancelled | genre=RPG |}}'''''The Trilogy''''' was a planned video game that covered both ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'', designed by a developer under the pseudonym "Smeagol 88". It was developed with Klik & Play, and later with ''Multimedia Fusion'', with game-development engines designed by [[wikipedia:Clickteam|Clickteam]].
